00036 void WorldModel::getSceneObjects(vector<rsg::Attribute> attributes, vector<SceneObject>& results) {
00037         TimeStamp currentTime(timer.getCurrentTime());
00038         vector<unsigned int>resultIds;
00039         results.clear();
00040 
00041         scene.getNodes(attributes, resultIds);
00042         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < static_cast<unsigned int>(resultIds.size()); ++i) {
00043                 SceneObject tmpSceneObject;
00044                 tmpSceneObject.id = resultIds[i];
00045 
00046                 vector<unsigned int> parentIds;
00047                 scene.getNodeParents(resultIds[i], parentIds);
00048                 if (static_cast<unsigned int>(parentIds.size()) < 1) {
00049                         tmpSceneObject.parentId = 0; // not initialized
00050                         LOG(WARNING) << "SceneObject has not parent node. Setting value to 0.";
00051                 } else {
00052                         tmpSceneObject.parentId = parentIds[0]; // here we arbitrarily select the fist parent; assumption: tree
00053                 }
00054 
00055                 IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr tmpTransform(new HomogeneousMatrix44());
00056                 if(!scene.getTransform(resultIds[i], currentTime, tmpTransform)) {
00057                         LOG(WARNING) << "SceneObject with ID " << resultIds[i] << " is not a TansformNode. Skipping.";
00058                         continue;
00059                 }
00060                 tmpSceneObject.transform = tmpTransform;
00061 
00062                 vector<unsigned int> childIds;
00063                 scene.getGroupChildren(resultIds[i], childIds);
00064                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < static_cast<unsigned int>(childIds.size()); ++j) {
00065                         Shape::ShapePtr tmpShape;
00066                         if (scene.getGeometry(childIds[j], tmpShape, currentTime) == true) {
00067                                 tmpSceneObject.shape = tmpShape;
00068                                 break; //stop on first found geometry
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071 
00072 
00073                 vector<rsg::Attribute> tmpAttributes;
00074                 scene.getNodeAttributes(resultIds[i], tmpAttributes);
00075                 tmpSceneObject.attributes = tmpAttributes; //TODO combined attributes from multible nodes?
00076 
00077                 results.push_back(tmpSceneObject);
00078         }
00079 }

00081 void WorldModel::getCurrentTransform(unsigned int id, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transform) {
00082

00085 void WorldModel::insertTransform(unsigned int id, IHomogeneousMatrix44::IHomogeneousMatrix44Ptr transform) {
00086         TimeStamp currentTime(timer.getCurrentTime());
00087         scene.setTransform(id, transform, currentTime);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void WorldModel::addSceneObject(SceneObject newObject, unsigned int& assignedId) {
00091         TimeStamp currentTime(timer.getCurrentTime());
00092         unsigned int dummyResultID;
00093         vector<Attribute> emptyAttributes;
00094         emptyAttributes.clear();
00095 
00096         /* a scene object is essentially a transform */
00097         scene.addTransformNode(scene.getRootId(), assignedId, newObject.attributes, newObject.transform, currentTime);
00098 
00099         /* add shape as a child node */
00100         scene.addGeometricNode(assignedId, dummyResultID, emptyAttributes, newObject.shape, currentTime);
00101 }

00111 void WorldModel::runOncePerception() {
00112 //      OutdatedDataDeleter* deleter = new OutdatedDataDeleter();
00113         OutdatedDataIdAwareDeleter* deleter = new OutdatedDataIdAwareDeleter(&scene);
00114         scene.executeGraphTraverser(deleter, scene.getRootId());
00115 }

00121 unsigned int WorldModel::getRootNodeId() {
00122         return scene.getRootId();
00123 }
